snippet: A former junior lawyer at the firm filed a lawsuit against Faruqi & Faruqi on Wednesday, accusing one of its most prominent partners of sexual harassment.
abstract: A former junior lawyer at the firm filed a lawsuit against Faruqi & Faruqi on Wednesday, accusing one of its most prominent partners of sexual harassment.

headline.main: Sexual Harassment Lawsuit Filed Against Prominent Plaintiffs' Lawyer
headline.print_headline: Prominent Lawyer Is Accused of Sexual Harassment
